original_text: Then the men were exceedingly afraid and said to him, “What is this that you have done!” For the men knew that he was fleeing from the presence of the Lord, because he had told them.
korean_text: 자기가 여호와의 얼굴을 피함인 줄을 그들에게 말하였으므로 무리가 알고 심히 두려워하여 이르되 네가 어찌하여 그렇게 행하였느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the men were exceedingly afraid
What is this that you have done!
that he was fleeing from the presence of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주의 앞에서 도망하고 있다는 것을
